reason: VAGUE REFERENCE: The statement says 'suffices for the following reasons' but the child nodes (1.3.1.1-1.3.1.3) reference EXTERNAL results (Lemma 2.1, Lemma 2.3, Riesz extension) that are not yet in scope. How can we verify that the weaker condition suffices if the theorems it supposedly suffices for are not proven or even stated here?
